attributes.action: Set up emergency homeless shelters in Birmingham for the cold Winter weather.
attributes.background: In Birmingham City Centre, there are so many homeless people without anything. By setting up emergency shelters around the City Centre, they’ll be warm and safe in the cold.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This is the responsibility of Birmingham City Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

You could also petition the Council here:

https://www.birmingham.gov.uk/info/20146/consultation_and_engagement/702/petitions
